detectors.description:
YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.sol#741-753) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.sol#743)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.sol#746)
detectors.markdown:
[YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.sol#L741-L753) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.sol#L743)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerALinkRewards.sol#L746)
